title: Nexar
description: Nexar was established in 2015 with a mission: to reduce the chance of collisions and to make the road safer for everyone. Like a school of fish or a flock of birds, we want to get every car on the road moving safely and smoothly together. Using a Nexar-powered dashcam, AI and inter-vehicle networking, Nexar makes every car a smart car and is building the world’s first safe driving network.
